department.ch: 人力資源管理研究所碩士班

goal.ch: This class will provide an overview of the staffing function and its role in the strategic human resource management. The topics include the scientific properties of human resource measures, the job analysis, the strategies in making decisions, and some predictors of job performance (e.g. application forms, reference checks, biodata, interview, ability test, and personality),  and the criteria measures. This class will introduce the steps to be taken and the inherent difficulties and constraints of selection to be addressed in developing a useful selection program.

flexDiscription.ch:
第17周: 各組於校外進行專案的資訊收集或公司個案訪談
第18周: 針對招募與甄選的相關議題，進行多媒體方式探詢與理解。
flexDiscription.en: The students are encouraged to collect field data from companies or cases. They can find relevant information or topics related to staffing via multi-media methods in the extra two weeks of time.
